General

  • Defeat monsters to collect mesos (coins)
  • Spend mesos on upgrades to defeat more monsters
  • Monsters can escape without consequence; expect for lost mesos
  • Mesos disappear after 20 seconds

    • Dragons

  • Dragons start small, but becomes more powerful with upgrades
  • Press [Z] near a dragon to recall/resummon them
  • Each dragon has their own strengths:
    • Red Dragon's attacks deals explosive damage to all mobs in the lane
    • Blue Dragon's attacks pierce & slow down mobs
    • Green Dragon's attacks apply ramping poison damage to mobs
    • Black Dragon's attacks create a bolt that damages mobs in every lane

    • Elemental Sprites

  • A maximum of five Elemental Sprites can be purchased
  • Multiple sprites of the same element may be purchased to stack their effects
  • The Elemental Sprites provide direct bonuses to the Wizard
    • Blaze provides the highest damage boost
    • Dawn increases range for looting mesos
    • Night provides increased knockback effect
    • Wind increases both attack & movement speed
    • Thunder provides pierce to projectiles
